## CommandExecutable interface

Command interface that contains non static fields and methods of a Command instance. It requires a type T that defines the arguments pass to execute().

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CommandExecutable<T extends ArgumentMetadataRecord> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [execute(args)](./jambo.commandexecutable.execute.md) | Executes the command with the provided arguments. |
